Posts.EditableText: Hi! when the option "show command bar" is unchecked, the function "wait for key press" doesn't show the expected "continue" link.. being a noob, I've no clue if thats expected (i would think "no" but who knows). --stephan
Posts.HTML:
Hi!

when the option "show command bar" is unchecked, the function "wait for key press" doesn't show the expected "continue" link.. being a noob, I've no clue if thats expected (i would think "no" but who knows).

--stephan
